title: @WAAARGHbobo Question regarding Noxus?
body:
I've noticed you were replying reasonably often so I was hoping you could answer this.
Given the new Lore changes with Sion and such, is there anything in the works regarding the general lore of Noxus (the black rose and the such?)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Happy Poro,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvGQFBtE,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-19T05:38:34.037+0000)
>
> I've noticed you were replying reasonably often so I was hoping you could answer this.
> Given the new Lore changes with Sion and such, is there anything in the works regarding the general lore of Noxus (the black rose and the such?)

Foundations has been doing work on Noxus and we've got a bunch of ideas about stories we would like to tell. I can't speak to the specifics due to spoilers, but let's just say that we'd like to visit Noxus, and certain important characters, this year. This doesn't necessarily mean a lore event, before folks read too much into this. Sorry I can't be more specific.

To your specific example, we had a breaking session a while back that included a story about Karma and the Black Rose that I loved the shit out of. That doesn't mean it will be one of the pieces we release this year (it's a complicated story and challenge for various media types), but I just wanted you to know it's an aspect we do think about.

Thanks for the Q, Happy Poro.
Can you please make Noxus not just a place where bad guys some from. That's all I ask.
Are you going to explore the fact that Noxus capital city is built on the throne of Mordekaiser? Is he going to bring a siege to Noxus anytime soon?

Oooh, tasty stuff. Sorry, I really can't speak to that as it would be spoiler-laden in either the confirmation or denial. All I can say is I heard a pitch as part of a session for Morde's recent new intro rewrite that I rather liked.

The more Morde lore the Merrier. 
Try saying this five times in a row^^

On a seeious note though; We didn't actually see anything Mordekaiser related during Shadow and Fortune but we all know our Man of Steel got hos own agenda. One I'd love to sneak a peek.
Oh well, happy to have been a.. Deadeye on that.. :3

If they are gonna do Ionia, they have to work on Noxus as well. Their histories are somewhat linked with the Occupation of Ionia. Also Noxus is the old land of Mordekaiser, so there is tons of "black Magiks" stuff they could do that can ultimately be liked with the Black Rose.
